title: The Devil’s Cage - Novel Updates
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Assassins   Bloodlines   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Demons   Detectives   Determined Protagonist   Dungeons   Firearms   Gods   Love Rivals   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Modern Day   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Pets   Poor Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sickly Characters   Skill Books   Special Abilities   Survival Game   Unrequited Love   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong   World Hopping   World Travel
author: Rusty Dragon   颓废龙
description: A virtual underground game that has no protection. Lurking with players who seek power, fortune and survival. Qin ran chose to enter this VRMMORPG game without hesitation because he knows this is his only way out from death. Can he escape death in real life or dying via the game?>
